name: tabnine-vscode
description: All-language autocompleter â€” TabNine uses machine learning to help you write code faster.
author: Jacob Jackson

tabnine.disable_line_regex.description: Disable TabNine when the current line contains a match of any of the provided regexes. For example, add "require" to disable TabNine when the current line contains the word 'require'.

tabnine.disable_file_regex.description: Disable TabNine when the file path contains a match of any of the provided regexes. For example, add "[.]js$" to disable TabNine in JavaScript files.
